title: Gender Classification with Python
description: In this article, I’ll walk you through a machine learning project on gender classification with the Python programming language.Gender classification is essential and critical for many applications in business fields such as human-computer interaction applications and computer-aided physiological or psychological analysis, as it contains a wide range of information regarding the difference of characteristics between man and woman.Also, Read – 100+ Machine Learning Projects Solved and Explained.
